payload.content: Yann LeCun predicts an inevitable shift from current large language models to a new paradigm of 'physical AI' based on world models.

payload.content: Yann LeCun argues that maintaining open-source AI research is important to mitigate the geopolitical risks associated with concentrated AI power.
